ibbsysMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
ibbsysMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

ibbsysMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
ibbsysMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
ibbsysMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

ibbsysMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
ibbsysMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

ibbsysMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
ibbsysMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !ibbsysMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

ibbsysMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
ibbsysMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !ibbsysMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
